tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.INPUT_CHECK.SAMPLESHEET_CHECK
tasks.command:
check_samplesheet.py \
        samplesheet.csv \
        samplesheet.valid.csv

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:INPUT_CHECK:SAMPLESHEET_CHECK":
        python: $(python --version | sed 's/Python //g')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.PREPARE_GENOME.CUSTOM_GETCHROMSIZES
tasks.command:
samtools faidx W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa
    cut -f 1,2 W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa.fai > W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa.sizes

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:PREPARE_GENOME:CUSTOM_GETCHROMSIZES":
        getchromsizes: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.PREPARE_GENOME.GET_RESTRICTION_FRAGMENTS
tasks.command:
digest_genome.py -r A^AGCTT -o restriction_fragments.bed W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:PREPARE_GENOME:GET_RESTRICTION_FRAGMENTS":
        python: $(echo $(python --version 2>&1) | sed 's/Python //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.PREPARE_GENOME.BOWTIE2_BUILD
tasks.command:
mkdir bowtie2
    bowtie2-build  --threads 1 W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa bowtie2/W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:PREPARE_GENOME:BOWTIE2_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_MAKEBINS
tasks.command:
cooler makebins \
         \
        W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa.sizes \
        1000 > cooler_bins_1000.bed

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_MAKEBINS":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_MAKEBINS
tasks.command:
cooler makebins \
         \
        W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa.sizes \
        2000 > cooler_bins_2000.bed

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_MAKEBINS":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.FASTQC
tasks.command:
printf "%s %s\n" SRR4292758_00_R1.fastq.gz SRR4292758_1.gz SRR4292758_00_R2.fastq.gz SRR4292758_2.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc  --threads 1 SRR4292758_1.gz SRR4292758_2.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:FASTQC":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.BOWTIE2_ALIGN
tasks.command:
INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2l$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && echo "Bowtie2 index files not found" 1>&2 && exit 1

    bowtie2 \
        -x $INDEX \
        -U SRR4292758_00_R2.fastq.gz \
        --threads 1 \
        --un-gz SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped.fastq.gz \
        --very-sensitive -L 30 --score-min L,-0.6,-0.2 --end-to-end --reorder \
        2> SRR4292758_0_R2.bowtie2.log \
        | samtools view -F 4 --threads 1 -o SRR4292758_0_R2.bam -

    if [ -f SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped.fastq.1.gz ]; then
        mv SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped.fastq.1.gz SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped_1.fastq.gz
    fi

    if [ -f SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped.fastq.2.gz ]; then
        mv SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped.fastq.2.gz SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped_2.fastq.gz
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO_MAPPING:BOWTIE2_ALIGN":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.BOWTIE2_ALIGN
tasks.command:
INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2$//"`

        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.TRIM_READS
tasks.command:
zcat SRR4292758_0_R2.unmapped.fastq.gz > tmp.fastq
    cutsite_trimming --fastq tmp.fastq \
        --cutsite AAGCTAGCTT \
        --out SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.fastq
    gzip SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.fastq
    /bin/rm -f tmp.fastq

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO_MAPPING:TRIM_READS":
        gzip: $(echo $(gzip --version 2>&1) | head -1 | cut -d" " -f2)
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.TRIM_READS
tasks.command:
zcat SRR4292758_0_R1.unmapped.fastq.gz > tmp.fastq
    cutsite_trimming --fastq tmp.fastq \
        --cutsite AAGCTAGCTT \
        --out SRR4292758_0_R1_trimmed.fastq
    gzip SRR4292758_0_R1_trimmed.fastq
    /bin/rm -f tmp.fastq

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO_MAPPING:TRIM_READS":
        gzip: $(echo $(gzip --version 2>&1) | head -1 | cut -d" " -f2)
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.BOWTIE2_ALIGN_TRIMMED
tasks.command:
INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2l$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && echo "Bowtie2 index files not found" 1>&2 && exit 1

    bowtie2 \
        -x $INDEX \

        --threads 1 \
         \
        --very-sensitive -L 20 --score-min L,-0.6,-0.2 --end-to-end --reorder \
        2> SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.bowtie2.log \
        | samtools view  --threads 1 -o SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.bam -

    if [ -f SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.unmapped.fastq.1.gz ]; then
        mv SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.unmapped.fastq.1.gz SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz

        mv SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.unmapped.fastq.2.gz SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO_MAPPING:BOWTIE2_ALIGN_TRIMMED":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.BOWTIE2_ALIGN_TRIMMED
tasks.command:
INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2l$//"`

    fi

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.MERGE_BOWTIE2
tasks.command:
samtools merge -@ 1 \
        -f SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.bam \
        SRR4292758_0_R2.bam SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.bam

    samtools sort -@ 1 -m 800M \
        -n \
        -o SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.sorted.bam \
        SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.bam

    mv SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.sorted.bam SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.bam

    echo "## SRR4292758_0_R2" > SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    echo -n "total_R2	" >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    samtools view -c SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    echo -n "mapped_R2	" >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    samtools view -c -F 4 SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    echo -n "global_R2	" >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    samtools view -c -F 4 SRR4292758_0_R2.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    echo -n "local_R2	"  >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat
    samtools view -c -F 4 SRR4292758_0_R2_trimmed.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO_MAPPING:MERGE_BOWTIE2":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.MERGE_BOWTIE2
tasks.command:
samtools merge -@ 1 \
        -f SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.bam \
        SRR4292758_0_R1.bam SRR4292758_0_R1_trimmed.bam

    samtools sort -@ 1 -m 800M \
        -n \
        -o SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.sorted.bam \
        SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.bam

    mv SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.sorted.bam SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.bam

    echo "## SRR4292758_0_R1" > SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    echo -n "total_R1	" >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    samtools view -c SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    echo -n "mapped_R1	" >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    samtools view -c -F 4 SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    echo -n "global_R1	" >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    samtools view -c -F 4 SRR4292758_0_R1.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    echo -n "local_R1	"  >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat
    samtools view -c -F 4 SRR4292758_0_R1_trimmed.bam >> SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO_MAPPING:MERGE_BOWTIE2":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.MERGE_STATS
tasks.command:
mkdir -p SRR4292758
    merge_statfiles.py -f SRR4292758_0_R2.mapstat > SRR4292758.R2.mmapstat
    cp *R2.mmapstat SRR4292758/

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:MERGE_STATS":
        python: $(echo $(python --version 2>&1) | sed 's/Python //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO_MAPPING.COMBINE_MATES
tasks.command:
mergeSAM.py -f SRR4292758_0_R2_bwt2merged.bam -r SRR4292758_0_R1_bwt2merged.bam -o SRR4292758_0_bwt2pairs.bam -t  -q 10

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO_MAPPING:COMBINE_MATES":
        python: $(echo $(python --version 2>&1) | sed 's/Python //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.MERGE_STATS
tasks.command:
mkdir -p SRR4292758
    merge_statfiles.py -f SRR4292758_0_R1.mapstat > SRR4292758.R1.mmapstat
    cp *R1.mmapstat SRR4292758/

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:MERGE_STATS":
        python: $(echo $(python --version 2>&1) | sed 's/Python //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.MERGE_STATS
tasks.command:
mkdir -p SRR4292758
    merge_statfiles.py -f SRR4292758_0_bwt2pairs.pairstat > SRR4292758.mpairstat
    cp *mpairstat SRR4292758/

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:MERGE_STATS":
        python: $(echo $(python --version 2>&1) | sed 's/Python //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.GET_VALID_INTERACTION
tasks.command:
mapped_2hic_fragments.py \
        -f restriction_fragments.bed \
        -r SRR4292758_0_bwt2pairs.bam \
        --all \
        -s 100  -l 600  -t 100  -m 100000

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:GET_VALID_INTERACTION":
        python: $(echo $(python --version 2>&1) | sed 's/Python //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.MERGE_VALID_INTERACTION
tasks.command:
hicpro_merge_validpairs.sh -d -p SRR4292758 SRR4292758_0_bwt2pairs.validPairs

    ## For MultiQC
    mkdir -p SRR4292758
    cp SRR4292758_allValidPairs.mergestat SRR4292758/

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:MERGE_VALID_INTERACTION":
        sort: $(echo $(sort --version 2>&1 | head -1 | awk '{print $NF}' 2>&1))
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.MERGE_STATS
tasks.command:
mkdir -p SRR4292758
    merge_statfiles.py -f SRR4292758_0_bwt2pairs.RSstat > SRR4292758.mRSstat
    cp *mRSstat SRR4292758/

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:MERGE_STATS":
        python: $(echo $(python --version 2>&1) | sed 's/Python //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HICPRO.HICPRO2PAIRS
tasks.command:
##columns: readID chr1 pos1 chr2 pos2 strand1 strand2
    awk '{OFS="	";print $1,$2,$3,$5,$6,$4,$7}' SRR4292758.allValidPairs | bgzip -c > SRR4292758_contacts.pairs.gz
    ##sort -k2,2 -k4,4 -k3,3n -k5,5n SRR4292758_contacts.pairs | bgzip -c > SRR4292758_contacts.pairs.gz
    pairix -f SRR4292758_contacts.pairs.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HICPRO:HICPRO2PAIRS":
        pairix: $(echo $(pairix 2>&1 | grep Version | sed -e 's/Version: //'))
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.MULTIQC
tasks.command:
multiqc -f  .

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:MULTIQC":
        multiqc: $( multiqc --version | sed -e "s/multiqc, version //g" )
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_CLOAD
tasks.command:
cooler cload \
        pairs -c1 2 -p1 3 -c2 4 -p2 5 \
         \
        W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa.sizes:1000 \
        SRR4292758_contacts.pairs.gz \
        SRR4292758.1000.cool

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_CLOAD":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_CLOAD
tasks.command:
cooler cload \
        pairs -c1 2 -p1 3 -c2 4 -p2 5 \
         \
        W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa.sizes:2000 \
        SRR4292758_contacts.pairs.gz \
        SRR4292758.2000.cool

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_CLOAD":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_BALANCE
tasks.command:
cp SRR4292758.1000.cool SRR4292758.1000_balanced.cool

    cooler balance \
        --force \
        -p 1 \
        SRR4292758.1000_balanced.cool

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_BALANCE":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_ZOOMIFY
tasks.command:
cooler zoomify \
        --balance \
        -n 1 \
        -o SRR4292758.mcool \
        SRR4292758.1000.cool

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_ZOOMIFY":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_BALANCE
tasks.command:
cp SRR4292758.2000.cool SRR4292758.2000_balanced.cool

    cooler balance \
        --force \
        -p 1 \
        SRR4292758.2000_balanced.cool

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_BALANCE":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.TADS.HIC_FIND_TADS
tasks.command:
hicFindTADs --matrix SRR4292758.1000_balanced.cool         --outPrefix SRR4292758.1000_balanced_hicfindtads         --correctForMultipleTesting fdr         --numberOfProcessors 1

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:TADS:HIC_FIND_TADS":
        hicexplorer: $(hicFindTADs --version 2>&1 | sed 's/hicFindTADs //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.HIC_PLOT_DIST_VS_COUNTS
tasks.command:
hicPlotDistVsCounts --matrices SRR4292758.1000_balanced.cool                         --plotFile SRR4292758_distcount.png                         --outFileData SRR4292758_distcount.txt

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:HIC_PLOT_DIST_VS_COUNTS":
        hicexplorer: $(hicPlotDistVsCounts --version 2>&1 | sed 's/hicPlotDistVsCounts //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.TADS.COOLTOOLS_INSULATION
tasks.command:
cooltools insulation SRR4292758.1000_balanced.cool 15 25 50 --window-pixels > SRR4292758.1000_balanced_insulation.tsv

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:TADS:COOLTOOLS_INSULATION":
        cooltools: $(cooltools --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooltools, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_DUMP
tasks.command:
cooler dump \
        --one-based-ids --balanced --na-rep 0 \
        -o SRR4292758.1000_balanced.bedpe \
        SRR4292758.1000_balanced.cool

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:COOLER_DUMP":
        cooler: $(cooler --version 2>&1 | sed 's/cooler, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.COOLER_DUMP
tasks.command:
cooler dump \
        --one-based-ids --balanced --na-rep 0 \
        -o SRR4292758.2000_balanced.bedpe \

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COMPARTMENTS.COOLTOOLS_EIGSCIS
tasks.command:
cooltools genome binnify --all-names W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa.sizes 2000 > genome_bins.txt
    cooltools genome gc genome_bins.txt W303_SGD_2015_JRIU00000000.fsa > genome_gc.txt
    cooltools eigs-cis --bigwig -o SRR4292758.2000_compartments SRR4292758.2000_balanced.cool

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COMPARTMENTS:COOLTOOLS_EIGSCIS":
        cooltools: $(cooltools --version 2>&1 | grep version | sed 's/cooltools, version //')
    END_VERSIONS

tasks.name: NFCORE_HIC.HIC.COOLER.SPLIT_COOLER_DUMP
tasks.command:
cat SRR4292758.1000_balanced.bedpe | awk '{OFS="	"; print $1,$2,$3}' > SRR4292758.1000_raw.txt
    cat SRR4292758.1000_balanced.bedpe | awk '{OFS="	"; print $1,$2,$4}' > SRR4292758.1000_balanced.txt

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:SPLIT_COOLER_DUMP":
        cooler: $(awk --version | head -1 | cut -f1 -d, | sed -e 's/GNU Awk //')
    END_VERSIONS

cat SRR4292758.2000_balanced.bedpe | awk '{OFS="	"; print $1,$2,$3}' > SRR4292758.2000_raw.txt
    cat SRR4292758.2000_balanced.bedpe | awk '{OFS="	"; print $1,$2,$4}' > SRR4292758.2000_balanced.txt

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_HIC:HIC:COOLER:SPLIT_COOLER_DUMP":
        cooler: $(awk --version | head -1 | cut -f1 -d, | sed -e 's/GNU Awk //')
    END_VERSIONS
